Sentencas: Proton ceramic fuel cells (PCFCs) are an emerging clean energy technology; however, a key challenge persists in improving the electrolyte proton conductivity, e.g., around 10(-3)-10(-2)
Titulo: Designing High Interfacial Conduction beyond Bulk via Engineering the Semiconductor-Ionic Heterostructure CeO2-δ/BaZr0.8Y0.2O3 for Superior Proton Conductive Fuel Cell and Water Electrolysis Applications

Sentencas: S cm(-1) at 600 degrees C for the well-known BaZr0.8Y0.2O3 (BZY), that is far below the required 0.1 S cm(-1).
Titulo: Designing High Interfacial Conduction beyond Bulk via Engineering the Semiconductor-Ionic Heterostructure CeO2-δ/BaZr0.8Y0.2O3 for Superior Proton Conductive Fuel Cell and Water Electrolysis Applications

Sentencas: Herein, we report an approach for tuning BZY from low bulk to high interfacial conduction by introducing a semiconductor CeO2-delta forming a semiconductor-ionic heterostructure CeO2-delta/BZY.
Titulo: Designing High Interfacial Conduction beyond Bulk via Engineering the Semiconductor-Ionic Heterostructure CeO2-δ/BaZr0.8Y0.2O3 for Superior Proton Conductive Fuel Cell and Water Electrolysis Applications

Sentencas: The interfacial conduction was identified by a significantly higher conductivity obtained from the BZY grain boundary than that of the bulk and a further improvement from the CeO2-delta/BZY which achieved a remarkably high proton conductivity of 0.23 S cm(-1).
Titulo: Designing High Interfacial Conduction beyond Bulk via Engineering the Semiconductor-Ionic Heterostructure CeO2-δ/BaZr0.8Y0.2O3 for Superior Proton Conductive Fuel Cell and Water Electrolysis Applications

Sentencas: This enabled a high peak power of 845 mW cm(-2) at 520 degrees C from a PCFC using the CeO2-delta/BZY as the electrolyte, in strong contrast to the BZY bulk conduction electrolyte with only 229 mW cm(-2).
Titulo: Designing High Interfacial Conduction beyond Bulk via Engineering the Semiconductor-Ionic Heterostructure CeO2-δ/BaZr0.8Y0.2O3 for Superior Proton Conductive Fuel Cell and Water Electrolysis Applications

Sentencas: Furthermore, the CeO2-o/BZY fuel cell was operated under water electrolysis mode, exhibiting a very high current density output of 3.2 A cm(-2) corresponding to a high H-2 production rate, under 2.0 V at 520 degrees C.
Titulo: Designing High Interfacial Conduction beyond Bulk via Engineering the Semiconductor-Ionic Heterostructure CeO2-δ/BaZr0.8Y0.2O3 for Superior Proton Conductive Fuel Cell and Water Electrolysis Applications

Sentencas: The band structure and a built-in-field-assisted proton transport mechanism have been proposed and explained.
Titulo: Designing High Interfacial Conduction beyond Bulk via Engineering the Semiconductor-Ionic Heterostructure CeO2-δ/BaZr0.8Y0.2O3 for Superior Proton Conductive Fuel Cell and Water Electrolysis Applications

Sentencas: This work demonstrates an efficient way of tuning the electrolyte from low bulk to high interfacial proton conduction to attain sufficient conductivity required for PCFCs, electrolyzers, and other advanced electrochemical energy technologies.
Titulo: Designing High Interfacial Conduction beyond Bulk via Engineering the Semiconductor-Ionic Heterostructure CeO2-δ/BaZr0.8Y0.2O3 for Superior Proton Conductive Fuel Cell and Water Electrolysis Applications
